|name = Ancient Civilization Parts|gold_sell=90}} '''Ancient Civilization Parts''' are a [[material]] in {{PW}}. == Acquisition == *Defeat or capture [[Alpha Pals|Alpha bosses]]. *Defeat or capture [https://palworld.fandom.com/wiki/Dungeons Dungeon bosses]. *Defeat or capture [[Lucky Pals]]. *Open rare chests. ==Use== It's required to craft: * [[Egg Incubator]] * [[Electric Egg Incubator]] * [[Hip Lantern]] * [[Pal Essence Condenser]] * [[Homeward Thundercloud]] * [[Antique Dresser]] Weapons: {{Cols|2| * [[Decal Gun Set]] * [[Giga Grappling Gun]] * [[Grappling Gun]] * [[Homing Sphere Launcher]] * [[Hyper Grappling Gun]] * [[Legendary Assault Rifle]] * [[Legendary Cloth Outfit]] * [[Legendary Crossbow]] * [[Legendary Double-Barreled Shotgun]] * [[Legendary Handgun]] * [[Legendary Musket]] * [[Legendary Old Bow]] * [[Legendary Pump-action Shotgun]] * [[Legendary Rocket Launcher]] * [[Legendary Single-shot Rifle]] * [[Lily's Spear]] * [[Mega Grappling Gun]] * [[Scatter Sphere Launcher]] * [[Single-shot Sphere Launcher]] }} Armors: {{Cols|2| * [[Ability Glasses]] * [[Giga Shield]] * [[Hyper Shield]] * [[Legendary Cloth Outfit]] * [[Legendary Cold Resistant Pal Metal Armor]] * [[Legendary Cold Resistant Refined Metal Armor]] * [[Legendary Feathered Hair Band]] * [[Legendary Heat Resistant Pal Metal Armor]] * [[Legendary Heat Resistant Refined Metal Armor]] * [[Legendary Metal Armor]] * [[Legendary Metal Helm]] * [[Legendary Pal Metal Helmet]] * [[Legendary Pelt Armor]] * [[Legendary Refined Metal Helm]] * [[Mega Shield]] * [[Ring of Mercy]] * [[Ultra Shield]] }} ==Trivia== *In the [[Early Access 0.1.2.0]], this item was previously called '''Paldium Crystal'''. ==Gallery== File:Ancient Civilization Parts icon Old.png|Old Icon {{Navbox Materials}} [[Category:Materials]]
